scheduleButtonEvent

public void scheduleButtonEvent(PenDevice device,
                                long deviceTime,
                                PButton button)
Schedules button events. You must construct a new PButton each time you call this method (do not reuse).

scheduleScrollEvent

                                long deviceTime,

scheduleLevelEvent

public boolean scheduleLevelEvent(PenDevice device,
                                  long deviceTime,
                                  java.util.Collection<PLevel> levels,
                                  boolean levelsOnScreen)
Schedules level events. You can reuse the levels Collection but you must construct new PLevels each time you call this method.
